footer.about_totem: Totem is an indie game development collective that unites creators and players around a universe of interconnected game experiences. Totem Web Explorer is developed and maintained by IT-Dimension with support and supervising from Totem Foundation. Totem Web Explorer is a third-party software, it is recommended for usage by Totem but is not a part of Totem's core infrastructure.
